publicPostModal.title: Public post verification
publicPostModal.subtitle: Share the URL of the public post created with {{ hashtag }}. This will help us verify the challenge is completed.
coreDetails: Core details to start your campaign
createYourChallenge: Create your challenge(s), you can have multiple challenges for each campaign
addReward: Add rewards to attract fan engagement
numberOfUsersEligible: Number of users eligible for rewards
selectEventInfo: Link campaigns to one or more events. This helps users engage in challenges related to your event.
socialInfo: Each type of challenge is linked to a social platform. Select your preferred platform
hashtagInfo: Enter the hashtag you want users to use when they create a public post
socialURLInfo: Copy and paste the URL of the challenge with which it will be associated.
numberUsersEligibleInfo: Specify the number of users that will be issued a reward on completion of the campaign
eventURLInfo: Copy and paste the Event URL for the event you want users to attend.
rewardRarityInfo: Select a rarity for the reward given on completion of the campaign. We advise to only select Epic if the campaign is difficult to complete.
discountAmountInfo: Enter the discount amount in percentage. A discount code will be automatically generated for the user if they are provided a reward.
PUBLIC_VIDEO_WITH_HASHTAG: Post a public video with a hashtag in description
PURCHASE_TICKET: Purchase a ticket to an event
redeemableItemInfo: Enter the item that the rewarded user will be able to redeem at the event. The organizer must supply the item specified for the user upon redemption of the reward. MEREO DOES NOT POSSESS ANY ITEMS OR REWARDS.
campaignCreatedDes1: Once your campaign starts fans can engage in challenges
enterFourDigit: Enter the four digit code to validate the userâ€™s reward before rewarding
startInTheReward: Present {{reward}} as stated in the reward
rewardsWillDistribute: Rewards will be distributed once campaign has ended
rewardHaveDistributed: Rewards have been distributed, view rewarding members
redeemIntructions: At the venue, present the code to a staff member to redeem your reward
campaignDescription: Complete campaigns for a chance to obtain rewards
findAnEvent: Find an event to link to your challenge
inputYourAccess: Input your access token to link your shopify
accessTokenHasBeenSuccess: Access token has been successfully saved
validation.numberOfUsersEligibleForRewar: Number of users eligible for rewards is required
validation.rewardType: Number of users eligible for rewards is required
